tasks.label: Git: Commit and push to Vetri1706/Playbook
args: Set-Location "d:\appp"; git add -A; $branch = (git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD).Trim(); if (-not $branch) { $branch = 'main' }; $repoUrl = 'https://github.com/Vetri1706/Playbook.git'; $origin = (git remote get-url origin 2>$null); if (-not $origin) { git remote add origin $repoUrl } else { git remote set-url origin $repoUrl }; $staged = (git diff --cached --name-only); if ($staged) { git commit -m "Update backend PDF flow + deploy configs" }; git push -u origin $branch

tasks.label: Git: Commit and push (fixed quoting)
args: Set-Location "d:\appp"; $repoUrl = 'https://github.com/Vetri1706/Playbook.git'; $origin = (git remote get-url origin 2>$null); if (-not $origin) { git remote add origin $repoUrl } else { git remote set-url origin $repoUrl }; $staged = (git diff --cached --name-only); if (-not $staged) { Write-Host 'No staged changes to commit.' } else { git commit -m 'Update backend PDF + Vercel/Render deploy setup' }; $branch = (git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD).Trim(); if (-not $branch) { $branch = 'main' }; git push -u origin $branch

tasks.label: Git: Commit using -F - and push
args: Set-Location "d:\appp"; $repoUrl = 'https://github.com/Vetri1706/Playbook.git'; $origin = (git remote get-url origin 2>$null); if (-not $origin) { git remote add origin $repoUrl } else { git remote set-url origin $repoUrl }; $staged = (git diff --cached --name-only); if (-not $staged) { Write-Host 'No staged changes to commit.' } else { 'Update backend PDF and deployment setup' | git commit -F - }; $branch = (git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD).Trim(); if (-not $branch) { $branch = 'main' }; git push -u origin $branch

tasks.label: Git: Commit (no spaces) and push
args: Set-Location d:\appp; git add -A; $repoUrl = https://github.com/Vetri1706/Playbook.git; $origin = (git remote get-url origin 2>$null); if (-not $origin) { git remote add origin $repoUrl } else { git remote set-url origin $repoUrl }; git diff --cached --quiet; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 1) { git commit -m Update_backend_PDF_and_deployment_setup } else { Write-Host Nothing_to_commit }; $branch = (git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD).Trim(); if (-not $branch) { $branch = main }; git push -u origin $branch
